_comment: Created by ianb on 14/10/2013 11:45:31 using v0.9
title: How has health expenditure per head changed?
analysis_commentary: The UK health expenditure has been steadily increasing to a maximum of $3,456 in 2009. In 2010, health expenditure decreased for the first time and decreased further in 2011. Although the rate of increase in health expenditure in other similar countries has been slowing, no other country has decreased their health expenditure like the UK. The United States outspends every country in every year with the difference increasing every year.
data_source: Office of National Statistics, Health Data 2013
